title: The role of area deprivation index in health care disruptions among cancer survivors during the SARS-CoV-2 pandemic
content:
Publication date: July 2024

Source: Public Health, Volume 232

Author(s): R.W. Wagner, A. Natori, S. Prinsloo, A.K. Otto, E. Saez-Clarke, J.M. Ochoa, S.S. Tworoger, C.M. Ulrich, C.A. Hathaway, S. Ahmed, J.L. McQuade, A.R. Peoples, M.H. Antoni, F.J. Penedo, L. Cohen
